mapper.sql: select a.res_id "resId", a.info_type "infoType", a.type_id "typeId", a.res_desc "resDesc", a.res_file "resFile", a.file_size "fileSize", a.mime_type "mimeType", a.is_pic "isPic", a.create_by "createBy", a.create_time "createTime", a.modify_by "modifyBy", a.modify_time "modifyTime", b.type_name "typeName", a.ref_nums "resNums", (select count(a.res_id) "count" from info_ge_resref r where a.RES_ID = r.RES_ID) "count", a.bytes_content "bytesContent"
mapper.insert: insert into info_ge_resource ( res_id, info_type, type_id, res_desc, res_file, file_size, mime_type, is_pic, create_by, create_time, modify_by, modify_time, bytes_content ) values ( #{resId}, #{infoType}, #{typeId}, #{resDesc}, #{resFile, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileSize, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{mimeType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isPic}, #{createBy}, str_to_date('${createTime}', '%Y-%m-%d %T'), #{modifyBy}, str_to_date('${modifyTime}', '%Y-%m-%d %T'), #{bytesContent,jdbcType=BLOB} )
mapper.update: update info_ge_resource set res_desc = #{resDesc, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, res_file = #{resFile, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_size = #{fileSize, jdbcType=INTEGER}, mime_type = #{mimeType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_pic = #{isPic, jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_by = #{createBy, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = str_to_date('${createTime}','%Y-%m-%d %T'), modify_by = #{modifyBy, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modify_time = str_to_date('${modifyTime}','%Y-%m-%d %T'), bytes_content=#{bytesContent,jdbcType=BLOB}, type_id=#{typeId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, info_type=#{infoType, jdbcType=INTEGER}, ref_nums=#{refNums, jdbcType=INTEGER} where res_id = #{resId, jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: from info_ge_resource a left join code_ge_restype b on a.type_id=b.type_id where a.res_id = #{id}
from info_ge_resource a left join code_ge_restype b on a.type_id=b.type_id where a.res_id = #{id}

select a.res_id "resId", a.project_id "projectId", a.type_id "typeId", a.res_desc "resDesc", a.res_file "resFile", a.file_size "fileSize", a.mime_type "mimeType", a.is_pic "isPic", a.create_by "createBy", a.create_time "createTime", a.modify_by "modifyBy", a.modify_time "modifyTime", b.project_name "projectName", c.type_name "typeName" from info_ge_resource a left join info_project b on a.project_id=b.project_id left join code_ge_restype c on a.type_id=c.type_id
a.project_id = #{params.bo.projectId}
and a.res_desc like '%${params.bo.keyWord}%'
group by a.res_id
from info_ge_resource a left join code_ge_restype b on a.type_id=b.type_id where a.type_id = #{typeId} group by a.res_id
